title: Electric Vehicle All-Party Parliamentary Group
purpose: The group will review upcoming policy changes and policy concerns relating to electric vehicles and their charging infrastructure, from a manufacturing, energy supply, and infrastructure perspective, amongst others. The APPG will bring together manufacturers, businesses, media, NGOs, and experts to share information, promote awareness, and debate future policy options.

contact_details.registered_contact_address: House of Commons, London, SW1A 0AA. Tel: 0207 219 2051.
contact_details.public_enquiry_point_name: Matt Adams, Association for Renewable Energy and Clean Technology . Tel: 07487 695256
contact_details.secretariat: Association for Renewable Energy and Clean Technology  acts as the group's secretariat. https://www.r-e-a.net/
